DOC.brief_summary: The main aim study investigate effect daily consumption margarine enrich plant sterol ester fish oil fast triglyceride ( TG ) concentration . The study also aim investigate effect plant sterol fish oil fast total cholesterol ( TC ) , Low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) , High-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( HDL-C ) non-HDL-C. At last , effect plant sterol fish oil fast apolipoprotein concentration explore .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Spread With Added Plant Sterols Omega-3 Fatty Acids Blood Lipids
DOC.detailed_description: The main aim study investigate effect daily consumption margarine enrich plant sterol ester fish oil fast TG concentration . The study also aim investigate effect plant sterol fish oil fast TC , LDL-C , HDL-C non-HDL-C. At last , effect plant sterol fish oil fast apolipoprotein concentration explore . This exploratory objective analyze relevant treatment effect fast triglyceride concentration observe .
DOC.criteria: Fasting TG level screen : ≥ 1.40 ≤ 5.60 mmol/L Fasting LDLC level screen : ≥ 3.4 ≤ 4.9 mmol/L Recently ( < 6 month ) diagnose cardiovascular event ( ) , revascularization systemic inflammatory condition . Medical history might impact study measurement , judge study physician Use overthecounter prescribe medication may interfere study measurement Reported weight loss gain 3 kg period 2 month prior screen . Currently smoke nonsmoker le 6 month report use nicotine containing product 6 month prior screen and/or study .
